events.message: Customer reported an accident involving their vehicle hitting a street pole during heavy rain.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to collision damage to the car.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to handle the case promptly to ensure customer support.
Customer received official acknowledgement of the claim with information on next steps.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report for further processing.
Customer submitted all required documents including images of the collision and official police report.
The investigation team began assessing the vehicle damage and verifying reported details.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident details matched the submitted evidence.
A settlement offer was sent to the customer covering estimated repair costs for the vehicle.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and the communication process.
Claim was formally approved following acceptance of the settlement by the customer.
Payment for the agreed settlement was transferred to the customer's bank account successfully.
The claim was closed after confirming receipt of payment and final customer approval.
